content: प्रस्तु {c2c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To praise. {@--2@} To begin, commence; प्रस्तूयतां विवादवस्तु <ls>M. 1.</ls> {@--3@} To cause, produce; <ls>Māl. 5. 9.</ls> {@--4@} To say, relate, propound. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To relate, allude to, tell; <ls>Māl. 3. 3.</ls> {@--2@} To begin, commence.
